casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Wayne STANLEY. No. 376P02-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 4, 2003. Melissa L. Trippe, Assistant Attorney General, for State.

Motion by Petitioner to Appoint Counsel has been filed and the following order entered:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of December 2003."
